data.persona: I am a brown mouse. I live in a barn with my best friend, Horse. I like to hide from him in the hay.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Kitchen.
The kitchen a large room with stone walls and floors. There are cast iron and copper pots on stone shelves. There is a large fire burning stove located in the middle of the room.
There's a stove, some meat, some royal meals, some cast iron and copper pots, some shelves, some food, some pots, and some wood here.
A cat is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a dead mouse.
